name: Pain and Suffering
description:
This game was designed for the sole purpose of annoying the player. Everything in it is suspicious and its purpose may not be as it seems. Trust nothing.

WATCH YOUR STEP. 

Remember previous attempts, you will be reset A LOT.

There are 2 endings to the game, Good and Bad. :)

Controls: Left arrow (left), Right arrow (right), Up arrow/Space (jump).
